Intro.p: Holds EDFacts accountability elements for a State Education Agency.

Item.Description: Holds EDFacts accountability elements for a State Education Agency.

Description.p: The Id (GUID) that uniquely identifies the State Education Agency.
The Id (GUID) that identifies the SEA where accountability is being tracked.
An indication of whether the school or district met the High School Graduation Rate requirement in accordance with state definition for the purposes of determining AYP.
A unique indicator (usually a URL) that points to the codeset used.
